local_intent: Lift the grasped bread by 0.1 m along +Z to begin transfer while ensuring the grasp remains stable.
assumptions: Bread is already grasped before lifting
Vertical clearance of at least 0.1 m is available
coherence_with_global: Matches the GLOBAL_BT segment after verifying ObjectInGripper and performing MoveDelta(z,+0.1) before moving above the plate; confirms grasp stability post-lift.
